main.title: download
main.article:
Download

We have two small favours to ask:

Please, let us know that you are downloading jemris by sending an E-Mail to Kaveh Vahedipour. In return, we will keep you up to date of updates and bug fixes.

And please, help us with improving the software by announcing bugs.

Sources

  • [8 Apr 2012] jemris-2.5.2.tar.bz2 [5.4 MB]
  • [8 Apr 2012] jemris-2.5.2.tar.xz [5.1 MB]

Binary packages

Ubuntu 12.04 (Precise Pangolin)

  • [8 Apr 2012] 64bit: jemris_2.5.2-1_amd64.deb.bz2 [5.5 MB]
  • [8 Apr 2012] 32bit: jemris_2.5.2-1_i386.deb.bz2 [5.4 MB]

Mac OS X 64bit only

  • [9 Apr 2012] jemris-2.5.2.mpkg.zip [15.4 MB]

Windows XP and higher

  • [12 Apr 2012] jemris-2.5.2.zip [10.8 MB]
                            Parallel jemris requires MPICH2 IA32 1.4.1p1.
                            Install guide for Windows Vista, 7 & 8.

 

Contributers are highly welcome.
